column4: it'd complicate things more if you had random mounting all in / instead of organised in a folder
also it would cause *many* problems if you were using a mounting script, many of which still mount into /mnt
glxinfo|grep direct is really not an indication that the drivers are installed, it's just an indication that direct rendering (RenderAccel) option is turned on.
i know, but for the nvidia drivers it's an easy way of verifying that nvidia, not nv is used
it's not if the option isn't enabled.
